reviews.review: As a fan of the marvel universe, I say that this was more than a movie. It was a powerful adventure and an experience like no others. I will watch this movie time after time.
Storyline was okay. Batman trilogy way better.
Me gustó , es buena película , divertida y entretenida

Other than how well  Thanos was portrayed,  this movie  predictable  and average.  Definitely not the worst MCU movie but certainly not the best. Some of the acting was cringe worthy most notably Mark Ruffalo. Speaking of him why was Hulk not in the movie for more than 12 seconds??  Tom Holland  may look young which is what a lot of fans wanted for Spider-Man but a better actor should have been cast.  There were so many bad jokes.. Only two things that were surprising and interesting were the use of Stombreaker as Thor's weapon and the post credit scene. Overall this movie is overrated.

Fantastic! Marvel just keeps getting better and better in my opinion (they’re getting right what Star Wars is failing with - building a great extended universe). This movie was great from beginning to end. The ending leaves you speechless. The character arc of Thanos is complex and enjoyable. You may tear up more than once in the film. Oh, and stay for a scene after ALL credits.

Fantastic Film. Exciting action scenes where this monster sized movie manages to get every character a moment to shine. If you not up to speed with the MCU. I can see it being a little confusing, but the humor and action will keep you entertained.

Ok, so seeing the movies as just a movie. I thought it was really good the special effects and just the movie in general I thought was pretty good. But following it from the original comic book series. Mmmm not so much. My fiance is a die-hard   Marvel fan. And he was just disappointed mainly because it didn't follow the original comic book series story, but liked it for being a movie. But I would definitely recommend to watch.

Ótimo roteiro.. colocando cada personagem em um ponto congruente na história(mesmo que uma minúscula parte da história seja forçada) atores e atrizes fantásticos, assim como os efeitos sonoros, visuais e especiais. É um filme que valeu a pena aguardar e que cumpriu o que prometeu.
Porém, há apenas 2 pontos à ressaltar:
Haver piada de personagem em momentos mais tenebrosos, tirando a imersão do filme mesmo que por um breve momento. E poderiam ter feito um pouco mais longo, para aproveitar um pouco mais cada personagem.

I understand the need to "clean house" a bit with regard to character, and I understand the desire to show a realistic universe in which things don't always work out... I just totally disagree with it.  There are plenty of movies which focus on the harsh realities of the world... movies about superhuman beings flying around and defying the laws of nature are not amongst them.


This movie did an excellent job of jolting me out of the preconceived notion that I was going to the theatre to watch the good guys win, and the bad guys lose... and maybe see some cool action scenes and hear some funny jokes.  Unfortunately, that is what I was going to see!


I'm looking forward to the next Marvel movie... so I can decide not to watch it, and instead go to a grown up "real movie."  Thank you Marvel.
